channel.title: Partyhat Christmas Event
channel.description:
What was it like?
Also, Santa and H'ween masks, what was the event like for getting those?
Lastly, what year was they? I started in 2001 so hope I didn't just miss the event for being a noob.

item.title: Partyhat Christmas Event
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

reyx7:

Anyone remember the good ol days in like 04 in and 05 how people would sell phats behind varrock bank between the wall for 1-4m? I was sad I was poor fuck back then, 1m seemed like so much. Although money was harder back in those days. Still, the day jagex took over the prices of phats went up like 9000%.

I remember

but i was the biggest noob alive back then, and i still am so i had almost no idea till i saw a phat what it was, then i was thinking “noice!” how much? “You dont have the money” “ye i do! im like super rich!” “6m” “Screw you noob”

Read full topic

item.title: Partyhat Christmas Event
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

The events were pretty lame. But the rewards were amazing. In 03 people were selling them to the stores, and to new comers for around 10k-20k a piece just for cash. I remember this guy trading me and showing me about 200 party hats and then he just sold almost all of them to the stores. Now they are over 200m a piece so he must be pretty mad.

Also all the new items since 06 will not be tradable, they will just be rare when you use them… not to mention the whole you destroy a holiday item you can go to draynor and get them back…

I rarely see anyone with the scarfs and bobble hats… I got everyone along with every holiday item since 03…

Read full topic

item.title: Partyhat Christmas Event
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:20, topic:374290”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=470269.msg3438590#msg3438590 date=1292954466]
Shortly after I started playing RS2 in 2005, I bought a santa hat for 200k, and a green and blue halloween mask for I think 400k. That was a lot of money, mostly gotten from my mining script. I sold them for a 50k profit and later the account was banned and I never played again, fun stuff.
[/quote]
Very inspirational. :P[/quote]
I remember when i first saw an santa hat in 05, im like big shit, i have one of those at home.
Then i saw a hween mask, i thought holy crap how much.
When he said 400k, i got deppresed , back then, 400k was like 100m to me lol, so its like nothing ever changed for me price wise

Read full topic

item.title: Partyhat Christmas Event

@Spades wrote:

The War Ship may be rare, but you can’t trade them… If they did allow them to be traded I recon it’d be one of the more expensive items on RuneScape, just like the Disk of Returning.

Also, there is an estimated 15,000 of each mask and around 20,000 of Santa’s.[/quote]

Jagex has said that warships are the rarest item.

item.title: Partyhat Christmas Event
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:26, topic:374290”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=470269.msg3439335#msg3439335 date=1292982035]

[ img]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/1830/101221173256.png[/img]

Rarest thing I have on my account, Can’t trade either of them. Impossible for 1 person to have both halfs. I did this when my account was level 3.

Back when I did that quest, 2 people had to work together. One person would trade the other their shield, and the person with both halves would go to the varrock (king? i forget) and turn them in for 2 vouchers. Trade one voucher to your ‘partner’ and use it.
[/quote]

It’s different now… I don’t know how they do it now, but you can’t trade them.[/quote]
Either person has to go to either gang in Varrock and obtain the items theirselves. Then you trade a voucher I believe.

Moparisthebest:

Shortly after I started playing RS2 in 2005, I bought a santa hat for 200k, and a green and blue halloween mask for I think 400k. That was a lot of money, mostly gotten from my mining script. I sold them for a 50k profit and later the account was banned and I never played again, fun stuff.

So you’ve never played RuneScape again? Why do you own the most popular RuneScape private server forums then, lol?

Read full topic
